summary: Build a product-selling e-commerce app similar to Flipkart.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern shopping bag logo with a warm neutral palette (shop-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide e-commerce hero banner illustration with abstract shopping shapes, warm neutral palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- Empty state illustration: cart with no items, warm neutral palette (empty-cart.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and a basic account area that shows the logged-in principal and supports sign-out.
Build the storefront UI: home page with featured sections, product listing page with search/filter/sort, and product detail page with images, price, stock, and add-to-cart controls.

Implement cart functionality end-to-end: add/remove items, change quantity, view cart totals, and persist cart per signed-in user (and optionally an ephemeral cart for signed-out users on the frontend).
Implement checkout and orders without external payments: collect a shipping address, validate stock, create an order, decrement stock, and show an order confirmation + order history page.
Add an admin/seller management area (role-protected): create/edit/delete products, manage inventory (stock), and view incoming orders.

Create a coherent, modern visual theme for the e-commerce UI (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across storefront, cart, checkout, and admin pages (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).
Add basic navigation and routing for: Home, Shop/Browse, Product Detail, Cart, Checkout, Orders, Account, and Admin (if authorized).
Add input validation and user-friendly error messaging across critical flows (product creation, cart updates, checkout, order creation).
Generate and include required static brand assets (logo and a simple hero/banner illustration) and render them from the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Flipkart-like e-commerce product selling app (catalog, search/browse, product pages, cart, checkout/orders, user accounts, payments, seller/admin management).
Create backend data models and stable storage for an e-commerce app: products, categories, carts, orders, and user roles (buyer vs admin/seller).
Expose backend canister methods for product browsing and discovery: list products (paginated), filter by category, sort (newest/price), and keyword search over title/description.
Seed the app with initial demo data (categories + a set of products) to make the storefront usable immediately after deployment.
Add lightweight analytics-like internal counters (no third-party analytics): track product views and purchases per product to support “Popular” sorting/sections.

projectName: Flipkart-like e-commerce product selling app (catalog, cart, orders, admin)
